At level 2 it grants one more reload per turn.

At level 4 it grants two more reloads per turn.

At level 5 it grants three more reloads per turn.
talents.name: Bow Mastery

talents.info_text: You fire an arrow that cuts right through anything, piercing multiple targets if possible with nigh infinite armor penetration, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage.
talents.name: Piercing Arrow

talents.info_text:

This talent does not use any stamina.
talents.name: Dual Arrows

talents.name: Volley of Arrows

At level 4, it grants two more reloads per turn.

talents.name: Sling Mastery

talents.info_text:
You fire a shot into your target's eyes, blinding it for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns and doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage.

The blind chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Eye Shot

talents.info_text:
You fire a mighty shot at your target, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage and knocking it back.

The knockback chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Inertial Shot

talents.info_text: You fire an average of 3.0, 3.7, 4.1, 4.3, 4.5 shots at your target, doing 50%, 58%, 65%, 70%, 75% damage with each shot.
talents.name: Multishot

description: Specialized sling techniques.

name: archery excellence

talents.info_text:
Your reflexes are lightning-fast, if you spot a projectile (arrow, shot, spell, …) you can instantly shoot at it without taking a turn to take it down.

You can shoot down up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 projectiles.
talents.name: Shoot Down

talents.info_text:
You rush toward your foe, readying your shot. If you reach the enemy, you release the shot, imbuing it with great power.

The shot does 216%, 243%, 264%, 282%, 298% weapon damage and knocks back your target by 4, 6, 7, 8, 8.
talents.name: Bull Shot

talents.info_text:
Activating this talent enhances your reflexes to incredible levels. Each time you are attacked in melee, you have a 23%, 35%, 44%, 50%, 56% chance get a defensive shot off in time to intercept the attack, fully disrupting it (including extra blows from certain talents), dealing 65%, 76%, 84%, 90%, 97% archery damage, and knocking the attacker back 1, 1, 2, 3, 3 tiles.

Activating this talent will not interrupt reloading.
talents.name: Intuitive Shots

talents.info_text:
You fire a shot at your target's throat, mouth, or equivalent body part, doing 130%, 147%, 160%, 171%, 181% damage and silencing it for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The silence chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Strangling Shot

description: Specialized archery techniques that result from honed training.

name: archery prowess

talents.info_text:
You fire a burning shot, doing 85%, 100%, 111%, 121%, 129% fire damage to the target and lighting up the area around the target in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 3, 3.

At level 3, it also has a chance to blind for 3 turns.
talents.name: Flare

talents.info_text:
You fire a crippling shot, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage and reducing your target's speed by 19%, 39%, 40%, 40%, 40% for 7 turns.

The status power and status hit chance improve with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Crippling Shot

talents.info_text:
You fire a pinning shot, doing 120%, 128%, 135%, 140%, 145% damage and pinning your target to the ground for 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 turns.

The pinning chance increases with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Pinning Shot

talents.info_text:
You fire multiple shots in a circular pattern with radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 3, doing 100%, 122%, 138%, 151%, 164% damage and stunning everyone hit for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The stun chance increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Scatter Shot

description: Specialized archery techniques to maim your targets.

name: archery training

talents.info_text: A steady shot, doing 166%, 189%, 207%, 222%, 235% damage.
talents.name: Steady Shot

talents.info_text:
You enter a calm, focused stance, increasing your Physical Power (+29, +40, +48, +54, +61), Accuracy (+29, +40, +48, +54, +61), Armour penetration (+28, +39, +47, +53, +60), and critical chance (+32%, +43%, +51%, +57%, +64%), but reducing your firing speed by 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28% and making you unable to move.

The effects will increase with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Aim

talents.info_text: You switch to a fluid and fast battle stance, increasing your firing speed by 13%, 27%, 40%, 51%, 62% at the cost of your Accuracy (-11, -14, -17, -20, -22), Physical Power (-11, -14, -17, -20, -22), and critical chance (-11%, -15%, -17%, -20%, -22%).
talents.name: Rapid Shot

talents.info_text:
You fire a shot without putting much strength into it, doing 80%, 93%, 102%, 111%, 118% damage.

That brief moment of relief allows you to regain 22, 32, 43, 53, 64 stamina.
talents.name: Relaxed Shot

description: Generic archery techniques.

name: battle tactics

talents.info_text:
Concentrate on your blows; each strike has a 46%, 54%, 58%, 61%, 63% chance to deal another, similar, blow for 5, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

This works for all blows, even ones from other talents and from shield bashes.

The chance increases with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Greater Weapon Focus
Step Up
talents.info_text:
After killing a foe, you have a 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100% chance to gain a 1000% movement speed bonus for 1 game turn.

The bonus disappears as soon as any action other than moving is done.

Note: since you will be moving very fast, game turns will pass very slowly.

Lashes at the target, doing 135%, 150%, 161%, 171%, 179% weapon damage.

If the attack hits, the target will bleed for 261%, 286%, 305%, 322%, 336% weapon damage over 7 turns, and all healing will be reduced by 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56%.
talents.name: Bleeding Edge

talents.info_text:
Take a defensive stance to resist the onslaught of your foes.

For each 10% of your health below maximum you are currently at, you gain 5% all damage resistance and 2.5% all damage resistance cap.

This consumes stamina rapidly (-12, -9, -7, -5, -4 stamina/turn).
talents.name: True Grit

description: Advanced combat tactics.

name: bloodthirst

talents.name: Bloodbath
talents.info_text:
Delight in spilling the blood of your foes. After scoring a critical hit, your maximum hit points will be increased by 2%, 5%, 8%, 10%, 12%, your life regeneration by 2.07, 3.34, 4.30, 5.12, 5.84 per turn, and your stamina regeneration by 0.41, 0.67, 0.86, 1.02, 1.17 per turn for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

The life and stamina regeneration will stack up to five times, for a maximum of 10, 17, 22, 26, 29 and 2.07, 3.34, 4.30, 5.12, 5.84 each turn, respectively.

talents.name: Mortal Terror
talents.info_text:
Your mighty blows inspire utter terror on your foes. Any melee strike you do that deals more than 41%, 32%, 27%, 24%, 22% of the target's total life puts them in a mortal terror, dazing them for 5 turns.

Your critical strike chance also increase by 2%, 5%, 8%, 11%, 14%.

The daze chance increase with your Physical Power.
Each time one of your foes bites the dust, you feel a surge of power, increasing your strength by 2 up to a maximum of 7, 15, 23, 31, 39 for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.
talents.name: Bloodrage

talents.info_text:
You enter a battle frenzy for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns. During that time, you can not use items, healing has no effect, and your health cannot drop below 1.

At the end of the frenzy, you regain 4%, 10%, 14%, 17%, 20% of your health per foe slain during the frenzy.
talents.name: Unstoppable

description: Delight in the act of battle and the spilling of blood.

name: combat techniques

talents.info_text:
Rushes toward your target with incredible speed. If the target is reached, you get a free attack doing 120% weapon damage.

If the attack hits, the target is dazed for 3 turns.

You must rush from at least 2 tiles away.
talents.name: Rush

talents.info_text:
You focus your strikes, reducing your attack speed by 10% and increasing your Accuracy by 20, 27, 33, 37, 41 and critical chance by 9%, 15%, 20%, 24%, 28%.

The effects will increase with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Precise Strikes

talents.info_text: You have learned to focus your blows to hit your target, granting +45, +66, +85, +102, +118 accuracy and allowing you to attack creatures you cannot see without penalty for the next 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.
talents.name: Perfect Strike

talents.info_text: Through rigorous training, you have learned to focus your actions for a short while, increasing your speed by 16%, 27%, 37%, 46%, 54% for 5 turns.
talents.name: Blinding Speed

description: Generic combat oriented techniques.

You become better at using your armour to deflect blows and protect your vital areas. Increases Armour value by 2, 5, 8, 10, 13, Armour hardiness by 18%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56%, and reduces chance to be critically hit by 5%, 10%, 15%, 19%, 23%, assuming heavy mail armour.

(This talent only provides bonuses for heavy mail or massive plate armour.)

At level 1, it allows you to wear heavy mail armour, gauntlets, helms, and heavy boots.

At level 2, it allows you to wear shields.

At level 3, it allows you to wear massive plate armour.

name: conditioning

talents.name: Vitality
talents.info_text:
You recover faster from poisons, diseases and wounds, reducing the duration of all such effects by 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56%. Additionally, you gain 9.13, 12, 14, 16, 17 life regen and 20%, 27%, 32%, 36%, 39% healing modifier for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns when your life drops below 50%.

The healing modifier and life regen will scale with your Constitution.

Enemies are intimidated by how composed you remain under fire. When you take more then 5% of your maximum life in a single hit, all enemies in a radius of 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 will be intimidated, reducing their Physical Power, Mindpower, and Spellpower by 22, 30, 37, 42, 47 for 4 turns.

If your health drops below 41, 32, 27, 24, 22, you'll be unable to maintain your daunting presence, and the sustain will deactivate.

The power of the intimidation effect improves with your Physical power, and it's chance to affect your enemies improves with your Strength.
talents.name: Daunting Presence

talents.info_text:
You've learned to recover quickly from effects that would disable you. Each turn, you have a 27%, 43%, 51%, 56%, 59% chance to recover from a single stun effect.

At talent level 2 you may also recover from blindness, at level 3 confusion, level 4 pins, and level 5 slows.

Only one effect may be recovered from each turn, and the chance to recover from an effect scales with your Constitution.
talents.name: Unflinching Resolve

talents.info_text:
You release a surge of adrenaline that increases your Physical Power by 11, 14, 17, 19, 21 for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. While the effect is active, you may continue to fight beyond the point of exhaustion.

Your stamina based sustains will not be disabled if your stamina reaches zero, and you may continue to use stamina based talents while at zero stamina at the cost of life.

The Physical Power increase will scale with your Constitution.

Using this talent does not take a turn.
talents.name: Adrenaline Surge

description: Physical conditioning.

name: dual techniques

Attack with your offhand weapon for 110%, 127%, 140%, 151%, 161% damage. If the attack hits, the target is stunned for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns, and you hit it with your mainhand weapon doing 110%, 127%, 140%, 151%, 161% damage.

talents.info_text: Increases the damage of your off-hand weapon to 68%, 77%, 82%, 85%, 87%.

talents.name: Dual Weapon Defense
talents.info_text:
You have learned to block incoming blows with your weapons. When dual wielding, your defense is increased by 25, 34, 40, 46, 51.

The Defense bonus scales with your Dexterity. At talent levels higher than 5, you may parry melee attacks with your offhand weapon (except mindstars).

(You currently have a 0%, 0%, 0%, 3%, 23% chance to deflect up to 0 damage (0%, 0%, 0%, 0%, 15% of your offhand weapon damage) from approximately 0.0, 0.6, 1.3, 1.8, 2.2 melee attacks (based on your Cunning) each turn.)

You have learned to hit the right spot, increasing your armor penetration by 11, 16, 21, 25, 29 when dual wielding.

The Armour penetration bonus will increase with your Dexterity.

The stun chance will improve with your Physical Power.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.name: Uppercut

The area damage will scale with your Strength, and the radius will increase by 1 for every four talent levels.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.name: Concussive Punch

talents.info_text:

The daze chance will increase with your Physical Power.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.name: Body Shot

talents.info_text:
A vicious finishing strike that deals 175%, 190%, 201%, 211%, 219% damage + 10% damage per combo point you have. If the target ends up with low enough life (<20%), it might be instantly killed.

Killing a target with Haymaker will instantly restore 3%, 7%, 10%, 12%, 15% to 14%, 16%, 18%, 20%, 21% of your maximum stamina, depending on the amount of combo points you've accumulated.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
talents.name: Haymaker

description: Finishing moves that use combo points and may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.

name: grappling

talents.info_text:
Grapples a target up to one size category larger then yourself for 5, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns. A grappled opponent will be unable to move, and its Accuracy and Defense will be reduced by 15, 21, 25, 28, 32. Any movement from the target or you will break the grapple. Maintaining a grapple drains 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 stamina per turn.

You may only grapple a single target at a time, and using any targeted unarmed talent on a target that you're not grappling will break the grapple.

The grapple Accuracy and Defense reduction, as well as the grapple success chance, will scale with your Physical Power.

Performing this action will switch your stance to Grappling Stance.
talents.name: Clinch

The grapple effects will be based off your grapple talent, if you have it, and the damage will scale with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Maim

Your clinch talent now starts a crushing hold that deals 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 physical damage each turn. If the target is already grappled, the hold will instead become a stranglehold, silencing the target and inflicting 48, 65, 78, 89, 99 physical damage each turn.

Undead, targets immune to silence, and creatures that do not breathe are immune to the strangle effect, and will only be affected by the crushing hold.

The damage will scale with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Crushing Hold

talents.info_text:
Rushes forward and attempts to take the target to the ground, starting a grapple, inflicting 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 physical damage, and dazing the target for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. If you're already grappling the target you'll instead slam them into the ground for 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 physical damage and potentially stun them for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The grapple effects and duration will be based off your grapple talent, if you have it, and the damage will scale with your Physical Power.

talents.info_text: Forces all hostile foes in radius 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 to attack you.

talents.name: Shell Shield
talents.info_text: Under the cover of your shell, gain 44%, 54%, 63%, 70%, 76% global resistance for 6, 7, 7, 8, 9 turns

description: Talents of the various entities of the world.

name: pugilism

talents.info_text:
Deliver two quick punches that deal 45%, 60%, 71%, 81%, 89% damage each, and switch your stance to Striking Stance. If you already have Striking Stance active and Double Strike isn't on cooldown, this talent will automatically replace your normal attacks (and trigger the cooldown).

If either jab connects, you earn one combo point. At talent level 4 or greater, if both jabs connect, you'll earn two combo points.
talents.name: Double Strike

talents.info_text:
Reduces the cooldown on all your Pugilism talents by 11%, 22%, 28%, 34%, 37%. Additionally, every time you earn a combo point, you will regain 0.34, 0.70, 1.01, 1.29, 1.56 stamina.

Note that stamina gains from combo points occur before any talent stamina costs.
talents.name: Relentless Strikes

talents.info_text:
Attack your foes in a frontal arc with a spinning backhand, doing 135%, 150%, 161%, 171%, 179% damage. If you're not adjacent to the target, you'll step forward as you spin, gaining up to 26%, 35%, 35%, 43%, 43% bonus damage, which increases the farther you move.

This attack will remove any grapples you're maintaining, and earn one combo point (or one combo point per attack that connects, if the talent level is 4 or greater).
talents.message: @Source@ lashes out with a spinning backhand.
talents.name: Spinning Backhand

talents.info_text:
Lashes out at the target with three quick punches that each deal 75%, 90%, 101%, 111%, 119% damage.

Earns one combo point. If your talent level is 4 or greater, this instead earns one combo point per blow that connects.
talents.message: @Source@ lashes out with a flurry of fists.
talents.name: Flurry of Fists

description: Unarmed Boxing techniques that may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.

name: shield defense

talents.info_text:
Enter a protective battle stance, increasing Defense by 14, 21, 26, 30, 34 and Armour by 20, 24, 27, 30, 32 at the cost of -20% physical damage. The Defense and Armor increase is based on your Dexterity.

It also grants 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% resistance to stunning and knockback.
talents.name: Shield Wall

talents.info_text:
Let all your foes pile up on your shield, then put all your strength in one mighty thrust and repel them all away 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 grids.

In addition, all creatures knocked back will also be dazed for 3, 5, 7, 9, 11 turns.

The distance increases with your talent level, and the Daze duration with your Strength.
talents.name: Repulsion
Shield Expertise
talents.info_text: Improves your damage and defense with shield-based skills, and increases your Spell (+2, +4, +6, +8, +10) and Physical (+4, +8, +12, +16, +20) Saves.

You brace yourself for the final stand, increasing Defense by 15, 19, 22, 25, 27, maximum and current life by 172, 226, 266, 300, 330, but making you unable to move.

Your stand lets you concentrate on every blow, allowing you to avoid death from normally fatal wounds. You can only die when reaching -172, -226, -266, -300, -330 life; however below 0 life you can not see how much you have left.

The increase in Defense is based on your Dexterity, and the increase in life is based on your Constitution and normal maximum life.
talents.name: Last Stand

description: Specialized weapon and shield techniques.

name: shield offense

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with two shield strikes, doing 135%, 150%, 161%, 171%, 179% and 165%, 184%, 199%, 211%, 222% shield damage. If it hits a second time, it stuns the target for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns.

The stun chance increases with your Accuracy and your Strength.
talents.name: Shield Pummel
Riposte
talents.info_text:
Improves your ability to perform counterstrikes after blocks in the following ways:

Allows counterstrikes after incomplete blocks.

Increases the duration of the counterstrike debuff on attackers by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 turn, turn, turn, turns, turns.

Increases the number of counterstrikes you can perform on a target while they're vulnerable by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2.

Increases the crit chance of counterstrikes by 25%, 27%, 30%, 33%, 35%. This increase scales with your Dexterity.

Hits the target with your weapon doing 105%, 116%, 124%, 130%, 137% damage and two shield strikes doing 105%, 116%, 124%, 130%, 137% damage, trying to overpower your target.

If the last attack hits, the target is knocked back. The chance for knockback increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Overpower

talents.info_text: Hits the target with your shield, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage. If it hits, you follow up with two automatic critical hits with your weapon, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% base damage each.
talents.name: Assault

description: Specialized weapon and shield techniques.

name: superiority

talents.info_text:
Concentrate on the battle, ignoring some of the damage you take.

Improves physical damage reduction by 17%, 24%, 30%, 35%, 40% for 20 turns.
talents.name: Juggernaut

talents.info_text:
Take an offensive stance. As you walk through your foes, you knock them all back in an frontal arc (up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 grids).

This consumes stamina rapidly (-4 stamina/turn).
talents.name: Onslaught

talents.info_text: Call all foes in a radius of 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 around you into battle, getting them into melee range in an instant.
talents.name: Battle Call

talents.info_text:
Put all of your strength into your weapon blows, creating shockwaves that deal 40%, 49%, 55%, 60%, 64% Physical weapon damage to all nearby targets. Only one shockwave will be created per action, and the primary target does not take extra damage.

Each shattering impact will drain 15 stamina.
talents.name: Shattering Impact

description: Advanced combat techniques.

name: thuggery

talents.info_text:
You smack your forehead against your enemy's head (or whatever sensitive part you can find), causing 52, 56, 60, 63, 66 physical damage. If the attack hits, the target is confused for 4, 5, 5, 6, 6 turns.

Damage done increases with the quality of your headgear, your Strength, and your physical damage bonuses.

Confusion power and chance increase with your Dexterity and Accuracy.
talents.name: Skullcracker
Riot-born
talents.info_text: Your attunement to violence has given you 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% resistance to stuns and confusion arising in battle.
You know how to hit the right places, gaining +7%, +14%, +20%, +25%, +30% critical damage modifier and 6, 11, 16, 20, 24 armour penetration.
talents.name: Vicious Strikes

talents.info_text:
You go all out, trying to burn down your foes as fast as possible.

Every hit in battle has +13%, +18%, +21%, +24%, +26% critical chance and +24%, +29%, +33%, +36%, +38% physical resistance penetration, but each strike drains 10, 8.2, 6.9, 5.9, 5.1 stamina.
talents.name: Total Thuggery

description: Whatever wins the day, wins the day.

name: two-handed maiming

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage. If the attack hits, the target is stunned for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The stun chance increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Stunning Blow

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage. If the attack hits, the target's Armour is reduced by 6, 13, 20, 25, 31 for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

Armor reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Sunder Armour

talents.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage. If the attack hits, the target's Accuracy is reduced by 3, 7, 11, 15, 19 for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns.

Accuracy reduction chance increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Sunder Arms

talents.info_text:
Enter a blood frenzy, draining stamina quickly (-2 stamina/turn). Each time you kill a foe while in the blood frenzy, you gain a cumulative bonus to Physical Power of 2, 5, 8, 10, 12.

Each turn, this bonus decreases by 2.
talents.name: Blood Frenzy

description: Specialized two-handed techniques.

name: two-handed weapons

talents.info_text: Spin around, extending your weapon and damaging all targets around you for 175%, 190%, 201%, 211%, 219% weapon damage.
talents.name: Death Dance

talents.info_text:
You enter an aggressive battle stance, increasing Accuracy by 22, 30, 35, 40, 44 and Physical Power by 22, 30, 35, 40, 44, at the cost of -10 Defense and -10 Armour.

While berserking, you are nearly unstoppable, granting you 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56% stun and pinning resistance.

The Accuracy bonus increases with your Dexterity, and the Physical Power bonus with your Strength.
talents.name: Berserker

talents.info_text: Shout your warcry in a frontal cone of radius 4, 5, 7, 8, 9. Any targets caught inside will be confused for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Warshout

talents.info_text:
Tries to perform a killing blow, doing 105%, 116%, 124%, 130%, 137% weapon damage and dealing an automatic critical hit. If the target ends up with low enough life (<20%), it might be instantly killed.

At level 4, it drains half your remaining stamina, and uses it to increase the blow damage by 100% of it.

The chance to instantly kill will increase with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Death Blow

description: Specialized two-handed techniques.

name: unarmed discipline

talents.info_text:
A push kick that knocks the target back 2, 2, 2, 3, 3 tiles, moves you back 1 tile, and inflicts 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 physical damage. If another creature is in the way, that creature will be affected as well. Targets knocked into other targets may take extra damage.

This will earn one combo point, and break any grapples you're maintaining.

The damage will scale with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Push Kick
Defensive Throw
talents.info_text:
When you avoid a melee blow while unarmed, you have a 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56% chance to throw the target to the ground. If the throw lands, the target will take 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 damage and be dazed for 2 turns, or 49, 66, 79, 91, 101 damage and be stunned for 2 turns if the target is grappled. You may attempt up to 0.0, 0.9, 1.5, 1.9, 2.2 throws per turn.

The chance of throwing increases with your Accuracy, the damage scales with your Physical Power, and the number of attempts with your Strength and Dexterity.
You focus your breathing, increasing stamina regeneration by 2.51, 4.46, 6.17, 7.73, 9.21 per turn at the cost of 10% global speed.
talents.name: Breath Control

talents.info_text:
Attack your foes in a frontal arc with a roundhouse kick, which deals 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 physical damage and knocks your foes back.

This will break any grapples you're maintaining, and the damage will scale with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Roundhouse Kick

description: Advanced unarmed techniques including kicks and throw that may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.

name: unarmed other

talents.info_text:
Increases your Accuracy by 2, 6, 12, 18, 25, and the damage multiplier of your striking talents (Pugilism and Finishing Moves) by 5%, 17%, 30%, 41%, 50%.

The bonuses will scale with your Dexterity.
talents.name: Striking Stance

talents.info_text:
Increases your Physical Save by 2, 5, 10, 15, 20 and your Physical Power by 1, 2, 5, 7, 10.

The bonuses will scale with your Strength.
talents.name: Grappling Stance
Empty Hand
talents.info_text:
Grants 0 Physical Power when fightning unarmed (or with gloves or gauntlets).

This talent's effects will scale with your level.

description: Base martial arts attack and stances.

name: unarmed training

talents.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65, and increases all unarmed damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% (including grapples and kicks).

Note that brawlers naturally gain 0.5 Physical Power per character level while unarmed (current brawler physical power bonus: 0.5) and attack 40% faster while unarmed.
talents.name: Unarmed Mastery

talents.info_text:
Superior cunning and training allows you to outthink and outwit your opponents' physical and mental assaults. Increases Defense by 15, 19, 23, 26, 28 and Mental Save by 15, 19, 23, 26, 28.

The Defense bonus will scale with your Dexterity, and the save bonus with your Cunning.
talents.name: Steady Mind

talents.info_text: When you're targeted by a projectile, your global speed is increased by 77%, 144%, 203%, 258%, 308% for 1 turn. Taking any action other then movement will break the effect.
talents.name: Heightened Reflexes

talents.info_text:
When gaining a combo point, you have a 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56% chance to gain an extra combo point. Additionally, your combo points will last 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 turns longer before expiring.

The chance of building a second combo point will improve with your Cunning.
talents.name: Combo String

description: Teaches various martial arts techniques that may not be practiced in massive armor or while a weapon or shield is equipped.

talents.info_text:
Release a powerful shout, doing 149, 200, 239, 272, 301 physical damage in a radius 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 cone in front of you.

The damage increases with your Strength.
talents.name: Shattering Shout
Second Wind
talents.info_text: Take a deep breath to recover 30%, 41%, 49%, 55%, 60% of your stamina.
Boost your life and stamina by 11%, 13%, 14%, 15%, 16% for 7, 11, 13, 15, 16 turns by bellowing your battle shout. When the effect ends, the additional life and stamina will be lost.
talents.name: Battle Shout

talents.info_text:
Your battle cry shatters the will of your foes within a radius of 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, lowering their Defense by 9, 18, 27, 36, 45 for 7 turns, making them easier to hit.

The chance to hit increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Battle Cry

name: warcries
description: Master the warcries to improve yourself and weaken others.
